data.title: Free Lottie Sewing Pattern Download
data.meta_description:
This pretty Pussy Bow Blouse pattern is available to download until Thursday
12th February - so hurry!Let's Get the UK Sewing!To celebrate the return of The
Great British Sewing Bee we are offering all sewing fans new and old the chance
to download a few of our exclusive patterns from the magazine as a pdf. We want
to give you a little taste of the great patterns from UK Pattern designers
Simple Sew!The Lottie Blouse will only be available for one week, so this is a
great opportunity to get hold
data.text:
This pretty Pussy Bow Blouse pattern is available to download until Thursday 12th February - so hurry!Let's Get the UK Sewing!To celebrate the return of The Great British Sewing Bee we are offering all sewing fans new and old the chance to download a few of our exclusive patterns from the magazine as a pdf. We want to give you a little taste of the great patterns from UK Pattern designers Simple Sew!The Lottie Blouse will only be available for one week, so this is a great opportunity to get hold of a completely free pattern - keep an eye on our Facebook page or Twitter for news of the next free pattern!If you're inspired by watching the Sewing Bee - take the plunge and download a free pattern complete with instructions!This Week ONLY Download the Lottie Blouse Pattern for FREE!The Lottie blouse is a really popular pattern from Issue 2 of Love Sewing!

If you prefer a paper pattern, head over to the Simple Sew website or follow the link below to order this classic style./*<![CDATA[*/ (function () { var scriptURL = 'https://sdks.shopifycdn.com/buy-button/latest/buy-button-storefront.min.js'; if (window.ShopifyBuy) { if (window.ShopifyBuy.UI) { ShopifyBuyInit(); } else { loadScript(); } } else { loadScript(); } function loadScript() { var script = document.createElement('script'); script.async = true; script.src = scriptURL; (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(script); script.onload = ShopifyBuyInit; } function ShopifyBuyInit() { var client = ShopifyBuy.buildClient({ domain: 'simple-sew.myshopify.com', apiKey: '1ed6f38a937d07aa1d4ad456ab0cd185', appId: '6', }); ShopifyBuy.UI.onReady(client).then(function (ui) { ui.createComponent('product', { id: [8493392769], node: document.getElementById('product-component-da4babefa85'), moneyFormat: '%C2%A3%7B%7Bamount%7D%7D', options: { "product": { "variantId": "all", "contents": { "imgWithCarousel": false, "variantTitle": false, "description": false, "buttonWithQuantity": false, "quantity": false }, "styles": { "product": { "@media (min-width: 601px)": { "max-width": "calc(25% - 20px)", "margin-left": "20px", "margin-bottom": "50px" } } } }, "cart": { "contents": { "button": true }, "styles": { "footer": { "background-color": "#ffffff" } } }, "modalProduct": { "contents": { "img": false, "imgWithCarousel": true, "variantTitle": false, "buttonWithQuantity": true, "button": false, "quantity": false }, "styles": { "product": { "@media (min-width: 601px)": { "max-width": "100%", "margin-left": "0px", "margin-bottom": "0px" } } } }, "productSet": { "styles": { "products": { "@media (min-width: 601px)": { "margin-left": "-20px" } } } } } }); }); } })(); /*]]>*/ Inside Issue 2 -

25 quick & stylish projects you'll love

Alison Smith's guide to perfect measuring

Quick makes with step-by-step instructions

Expert Sewing tips

Meet the Sewing Bee's Chinelo

Simple and fun party projects

Jazz up your baby clothes

DOWNLOAD THE FREE SIMPLE SEW LOTTIE BLOUSE PATTERN

[this pattern is no longer free to download] By completing the form and downloading the free pattern you accept to be added (if you aren't already!) to the Love Sewingand Simple Sew newsletters. You'll receive weekly competitions to win sewing supplies, free sewing patterns, sewing tutorials and news of our latest special offers and discounts. Your details will not be passed onto any third parties and it's easy to unsubscribe. DOWNLOAD CLOSES ON THURSDAY 12th FEB 2015! Here are the measurements for the pattern!
